hypothesis_content.title: Neutral-to-Bull Regime Transition Signal via BTC Dominance Reversal
hypothesis_content.statement: When the market is in NEUTRAL regime (confidence > 60%) and BTC dominance (BTC.D) experiences a sharp 3-day decline of >2% while BTC price remains within ±3% of its 20-day moving average, a rotation into high-beta altcoins (SOL, AVAX) will generate alpha over the subsequent 5 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: In neutral regimes, sharp declines in BTC dominance often precede capital rotation into altcoins as investors seek higher returns. The BTC price stability suggests the move isn't driven by BTC weakness but by deliberate altcoin accumulation.
entry_conditions: Enter long SOL/USDT and AVAX/USDT at market open following signal confirmation
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 5-day return of SOL and AVAX positions ≤ 3% or win rate < 55% across 20+ signals in backtest.
